A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Gee I feel so vindicated.  I said TFA has ruined the plotline of the series and that the  next one would be even worse and...tadaaaaaa!  It is!  Now Luke is just a mopey loser who never really accomplished anything other than walking out on his friends and family and dying sitting on his tush.
